text: == Births == * February 7 – Eubie Blake, American musician and composer * April 5 - Walter Huston, Canadian actor (d. 1950) * April 7 – Gino Severini Italian painter (d. 1966) * April 15 – Stanley Bruce, 8th Prime Minister of Australia (d. 1967) * July 29 – Benito Mussolini, Italian dictator == Deaths == * March 14 – Karl Marx, German philosopher * August 23 – Sarah Yorke Jackson, American First Lady == New books == * Pinocchio by Carlo Collodi
